text: Langpoklakpam Jayantakumar Singh is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Manipur Legislative Assembly from Keishamthong in the 2017 Manipur Legislative Assembly election as a member of the National People's Party. He is Minister of Health, Family Welfare, Law and Legislative, Art and Culture in N. Biren Singh cabinet.My NetaManipur CM allots portfolios to ministersPortfolios distributed in ManipurManipur CM Allocates Portfolios To Council Of Ministers, Launches Anti-Corruption Cell ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Manipur Legislative Assembly Category:People from Imphal Category:Manipur MLAs 2017– Category:National People's Party (India) politicians Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: Langpoklakpam Jayantakumar Singh
